mapper.sql: t.pkid pkid, t.id id, t.djzbbm djzbbm, t.zbmc zbmc, t.zbbm zbbm, t.sjzbbm sjzbbm, t.zblxdm zblxdm, t.djzbzkdm djzbzkdm, t.ssxfjgid ssxfjgid, t.gpsbh gpsbh, t.cldjdm cldjdm, t.cphm cphm, t.ggxh ggxh, t.zcbh zcbh, t.ckj ckj, t.sb sb, t.ys ys, t.gbdm gbdm, t.sccjid sccjid, t.sccjmc sccjmc, t.jkgn jkgn, t.shfw shfw, t.zrrid zrrid, t.zrrxm zrrxm, TO_CHAR(t.ccrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') ccrq, TO_CHAR(t.zbrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zbrq, TO_CHAR(t.bfrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') bfrq, TO_CHAR(t.yxqz,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') yxqz, t.ljyxsj ljyxsj, t.ljsycs ljsycs, TO_CHAR(t.bcbyrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') bcbyrq, TO_CHAR(t.xcbyrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xcbyrq, t.cjh cjh, t.fdjbh fdjbh, t.pch pch, t.jldwdm jldwdm, t.sfyyxl sfyyxl, t.sdzt sdzt, t.clztdm_mh clztdmMh, t.clztmc_mh clztmcMh, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, t.dthh dthh, t.ajbh ajbh, t.sfzp sfzp, t.sfzhdkqy sfzhdkqy, t.sfzdkqy sfzdkqy, t.clbh clbh, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.sjbb sjbb, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, t.jcjgzt jcjgzt, t.cljc cljc, t.jksjbb jksjbb, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, TO_CHAR(t.reserve3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve3
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM WL_CLXX t WHERE 1=1 AND jlzt = 0

SELECT
FROM WL_CLXX t WHERE t.jlzt = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WL_CLXX(pkid,id,djzbbm,zbmc,zbbm,sjzbbm,zblxdm,djzbzkdm,ssxfjgid,gpsbh,cldjdm,cphm,ggxh,zcbh,ckj,sb,ys,gbdm,sccjid,sccjmc,jkgn,shfw,zrrid,zrrxm,ccrq,zbrq,bfrq,yxqz,ljyxsj,ljsycs,bcbyrq,xcbyrq,cjh,fdjbh,pch,jldwdm,sfyyxl,sdzt,clztdm_mh,clztmc_mh,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,dthh,ajbh,sfzp,sfzhdkqy,sfzdkqy,clbh,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,jcjgzt,cljc,jksjbb,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES(#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{djzbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjzbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zblxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{djzbzkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssxfjgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gpsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cldjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ggxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zcbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ckj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sccjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sccjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jkgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zrrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zrrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ccrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{zbrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{bfrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE},#{ljyxsj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ljsycs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bcbyrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{xcbyrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fdjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jldwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfyyxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sdzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{clztdmMh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clztmcMh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dthh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfzp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sfzhdkqy,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sfzdkqy,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{clbh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jcjgzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cljc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jksjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE WL_CLXX t SET t.jlzt = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO WL_CLXX(pkid,id,djzbbm,zbmc,zbbm,sjzbbm,zblxdm,djzbzkdm,ssxfjgid,gpsbh,cldjdm,cphm,ggxh,zcbh,ckj,sb,ys,gbdm,sccjid,sccjmc,jkgn,shfw,zrrid,zrrxm,ccrq,zbrq,bfrq,yxqz,ljyxsj,ljsycs,bcbyrq,xcbyrq,cjh,fdjbh,pch,jldwdm,sfyyxl,sdzt,clztdm_mh,clztmc_mh,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,dthh,ajbh,sfzp,sfzhdkqy,sfzdkqy,clbh,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,jcjgzt,cljc,jksjbb,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES
